beans

Class State

  • java.lang.Object
    • beans.State

  • public class State
extends java.lang.Object
    Each state in the 8 puzzle problem has 8x8 values of numbers from 1-8. The blank position is represented by 0. It will also contain its heuristic and cost function along with its ancestors.
    Author:
    dennis

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) java.util.List<State> ancestors
      This holds the list of ancestors of the state
      private int g
      It holds the cost of the state from initial state to the current state.
      private int h
      It holds the cost of the state from the current state to the goal state.
      private java.lang.Integer[][] stateValues
      It holds the value of the State

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      State()
      It initializes the ancestors object along with object creation.
      State(State e)
      Using this constructor one state can be assigned to another by value.

      • State

        public State()
        It initializes the ancestors object along with object creation.

      • State

        public State(State e)
        Using this constructor one state can be assigned to another by value. The heuristic, cost and ancestors are set in this constructor.
        Parameters:
        e - the state that is to be assigned to the current state

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)
